snippet.title: Fallen Legion Trailer - E3 2016
snippet.description:
Fallen Legion is an action RPG coming to PlayStation 4 & VITA that serves as a reimagining of games like Valkyrie Profile and Odinsphere.

------------------------------­----
Follow IGN for more!
